content: a plain beanie with absolutely no fancy details or complicated techniques it has enough slouch to pull right down over your ears because sometimes it gets cold in australia beanie fits everyone in my family from kid to dad approx 52-60cm i think it is the best beanie i ve ever knit and probably the easiest school pickup swimming lessons assembly on the train never waste a minute with this project in your handbag instructions for you to size up or down are included you will easily get one beanie out of a 100g of 5ply/ sportweight or light dk yarn this free pattern has not been professionally tech edited
